title: Watch Face Denim
summary: Jeans Watch Face for Android Wear
description: Pimp your watch with Denim Design Watch Face. Clean and fast jeans interfase for everyday use.FEATURES:- 12/24 auto-format- Ambient (dimmed) mode- High Resolution Design- Round and Square watches SupportINSTRUCTION:1. Install Watch Face2. Wait a minute2. Go to Android Wear Application3. Choose Denim Watch Face4. Enjoy!The jeans watch face has been testing on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
descriptionHTML:
Pimp your watch with Denim Design Watch Face. Clean and fast jeans interfase for everyday use.

FEATURES:

- 12/24 auto-format
- Ambient (dimmed) mode
- High Resolution Design
- Round and Square watches Support

INSTRUCTION:

1. Install Watch Face
2. Wait a minute
2. Go to Android Wear Application
3. Choose Denim Watch Face
4. Enjoy!

The jeans watch face has been testing on Moto 360, LG G Watch R, ASUS ZenWatch, Sony SmartWatch and other.
comments: Nice but boring Nice graphics but gets boring after a while. I would have liked to get something more dynamic in its behaviour.
cool style thanks dev... maybe some more settings like increased time out, tap for day date battery etc
Good design watchface. Will be much better if display with date/day.
Excellent Perfect fit for denim jeans!
recentChanges: + Added manual settings for time (12/24) formats
+ Some fixes for Moto 360 (2nd Generation) and Huawei Watch
Please, don't forget to Rate It ★★★★★
